sun.jvm.hotspot.types

Interface JBooleanField

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Field
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BasicJBooleanField

    public interface JBooleanField
extends Field
    A specialization of Field which represents a field containing a Java boolean value (in either a C/C++ data structure or a Java object) and which adds typechecked getValue() routines returning booleans.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean getValue()
      The field must be static and the type of the field must be a Java boolean, or a WrongTypeException will be thrown.
      boolean getValue(Address addr)
      The field must be nonstatic and the type of the field must be a Java boolean, or a WrongTypeException will be thrown.

      • Methods inherited from interface sun.jvm.hotspot.types.Field

        getAddress, getAddress, getCInteger, getCInteger, getJBoolean, getJBoolean, getJByte, getJByte, getJChar, getJChar, getJDouble, getJDouble, getJFloat, getJFloat, getJInt, getJInt, getJLong, getJLong, getJShort, getJShort, getName, getNarrowOopHandle, getNarrowOopHandle, getOffset, getOopHandle, getOopHandle, getSize, getStaticFieldAddress, getType, isStatic
